author: UpIsNotJump
description:
Crystal of Atlan is launching May 28. Pre-register now to secure your exclusive rewards: https://coau.onelink.me/Kb3c/4huatq27.
Thanks to Crystal of Atlan for sponsoring the video.

It’s finally here! A remastered compilation of every VR gaming review I’ve done on the channel (excluding Fallout). Where we look back on how wrong we were that VR was going to take over the gaming and technological world. Yes, before Metaverse ruined it. 

My Patreon!
https://patreon.com/upisnotjump

My Merch!
https://www.pixelempire.com/collections/upisnotjump 

From Skyrim VR To Beat Saber, Half Life Alyx to Alien Isolation VR, here is a collection of some of the best VR Reviews on YouTube I MEAN - Biggest VR games available. 

Now I know what you are wondering? WHY REMASTERED? WELL In these VR reviews I have updated:

- Music (almost all of it replaced as it was ALL copyright material)
- Added back several cut scenes (many had to be edited out post uploading due to copyright)
- Re-did a lot of the Edit
title: VR Gaming Was An Absolute Nightmare - Complete Series
